meanings.sent1: The fishermen rowed the cogue gently on the calm lake.
meanings.sent2: We rented a cogue to explore the river during our vacation.
meanings.sent3: The cogue bobbed up and down like a playful duck in the water.
meanings.sent4: The cogue was a trusty companion, carrying them safely across the river.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cogue sparkled in the sunlight, a tiny gem on the water.

meanings.sent1: He tried to cogue his friends into believing his tall tale.
meanings.sent2: She didn't want to cogue anyone, so she always told the truth.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to cogue the audience with his disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: Her smile cogueed him into thinking everything was fine.
meanings.sent5: The sly fox tried to cogue the rabbit out of its burrow.

meanings.definition: A wooden block used in metalworking
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith hammered the red-hot metal onto the cogue.
meanings.sent2: The apprentice carefully shaped the metal around the cogue.
meanings.sent3: The cogue rolled off the table and startled the blacksmith.
meanings.sent4: The cogue held the metal firmly in place, aiding in the crafting process.
meanings.sent5: The old cogue had seen many years of hard work in the forge.

meanings.sent1: The fishermen cast the cogue into the water to catch fish.
meanings.sent2: The cogue was woven with care to ensure a good catch.
meanings.sent3: The cogue tangled with seaweed, making it difficult to retrieve.
meanings.sent4: The cogue glistened in the sun as it lay ready for the next fishing trip.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the cogue made it efficient in catching fish.

meanings.sent1: The knight donned his cogue before heading into battle.
meanings.sent2: The cogue protected his head during the fierce jousting match.
meanings.sent3: The shiny cogue reflected the knight's determined expression.
meanings.sent4: The cogue gleamed under the torchlight, a symbol of strength and honor.
meanings.sent5: The intricate engravings on the cogue told tales of past victories.
